channel.title: Can you help me staff?
channel.description:
ok staff of moparscape (or very good coders), how can i make my own server from scratch? like what program did you use to get the data like the item numbers, interface numbers, npc numbers and thing like that. and if you could, please pm me or post here the program so that i may:
A: help you develope the moparascape series B: help new programmers make there servers C: anything else you might think would be good.
so please help me with this simple question and i shall forever be grateful.[br][size=1]Posted at: November 16, 2006, 09:45:54 PM[/size][hr]please someone help, ill ++peR like 5 times and make you admin if your method works.

item.title: Can you help me staff?
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

ok so what program do i need to decode it. like a decoder, or dat opener or what? and by the way, thanks for helping.[br][size=1]Posted at: November 17, 2006, 06:55:06 PM[/size][hr]can you please help me find the program?

Read full topic

item.title: Can you help me staff?
item.dc:creator: @Javacisnotrecognized _^_
item.description:
@Javacisnotrecognized wrote:

You would have to decode the cache. Its stored at

C:\Windows.file_store_32\runescape\main_file_cache.dat2

NOTE: it may say .file_store_34, or a few other numbers.

Read full topic

item.title: Can you help me staff?
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

thanks for that. all i want is to knw how to “rip” the interface id’s and item id’s from the runescape client.

Read full topic

item.title: Can you help me staff?
item.dc:creator: @Javacisnotrecognized _^_
item.description:
@Javacisnotrecognized wrote:

The knowlege you need isn’t common here. We aren’t a bunch of people “developing” the MoparScape series. Actually, it would be better to say were trying to get a better server than anyone else by any means possible. The guy who first made one of these servers goes by the name “WinterLove”, and the person who is releasing the MoparScape edittions is the same man who runs this forum; Moparisthebest. If you really want to try and make a server from scratch, you would have to take some java classes. You can start here.

Read full topic
